description.narrative: This activity (Implementation phase-Mobilisation for Development (M4D)) is a component of Mobilisation for Development (M4D) Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £17,401,814. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Decentralisation and support to subnational government. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 22-08-2011 and the end date is 15-05-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
